params.name: save_directory
params.description: Directory where the feature extractor JSON file and the tokenizer files will be saved (directory willbe created if it does not exist).

params.name: push_to_hub
params.description: Whether or not to push your model to the Hugging Face model hub after saving it. You can specify therepository you want to push to with repo_id (will default to the name of save_directory in yournamespace).

params.name: kwargs
params.description: Additional key word arguments passed along to the push_to_hub() method.
